query:
SELECT 
  h.usuarioId,
  u.name AS usuarioNome,
  COUNT(*) AS totalAlteracoes,
  SUM(CASE WHEN h.tipo = 'exclusao' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS totalExclusoes,
  SUM(CASE WHEN h.tipo = 'edicao' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS totalEdicoes
FROM historico_alteracoes_vendas h
LEFT JOIN users u ON h.usuarioId = u.id
GROUP BY h.usuarioId, u.name
ORDER BY totalAlteracoes DESC;

  u.name AS usuarioNome,
  COUNT(*) AS totalAlteracoes,
  SUM(CASE WHEN h.tipo = 'exclusao' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS totalExclusoes,
  SUM(CASE WHEN h.tipo = 'edicao' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS totalEdicoes
FROM historico_alteracoes_vendas h
LEFT JOIN users u ON h.usuarioId = u.id
GROUP BY h.usuarioId, u.name
ORDER BY totalAlteracoes DESC;
